description: Trinetra is founded by a team of AI veterans, Person and Person, each bringing extensive experience in artificial intelligence to the forefront of our solutions.

founders.name: Vinayak Rana
founders.bio: Vinayak brings over 8 years of experience in machine learning and AI architecture. He has led multiple successful AI transformations across various industries.

founders.name: Mohammad Zaid Khan
founders.bio: Zaid is a seasoned technology leader with deep expertise in generative AI and MLOps. He has successfully deployed AI solutions for Fortune 500 companies.
